column4: Hi, I get an brasero error when burning the Ubuntu 10.04 AMD64 Desktop image: http://pastebin.com/wc1jUkGz What is the problem?
Problem is that Brasero is friggin' buggy. Use gnomebaker.
heh ok all i needed to know
Back... I can't figure out how to do a straight copy with gnomebaker
I don't want to make a data cd, i want to burn image to disc
Let me take a quick look
I had same error with gnomebake actually... "wodim cannot fixate disk"
I'll check, I got it from http://ubuntu-releases.cs.umn.edu/10.04/
I'll dl another copy from another place
gnomebaker and brasero both use wodim
No idea who wodim is, actually.
Altough no, I have a brief understanding but not much
it is the program that does the actual writing to disc http://man.cx/wodim%281%29
